title: Can You “Negotiate" Your Best Life?
description:
Global Negotiation Strategist, CEO of Venn Negotiations Christine McKay joins Jillian this week to share her key strategies to negotiating the life you want. Whether you are asking for a raise, selling your company, navigating the world of divorce etc. Christine shows us how to turn the tables in our favor!

Guest Link: www.VennJM.com has a free, downloadable guide on negotiation for the listeners


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
